programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: In a life full of restrictions, we've seen inmates take control of whatever they can, despite the consequences; we've seen frustrated inmates reach their breaking point; in the battle of wills, some will take actions that can never be reversed.

programme.title: Lockup: Louisville: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The Louisville Metro Department of Corrections Jail has a daily population of about 2,000 men and women charged with anything from minor crimes to capitol murder; both buildings are overcrowded and their layouts are outdated.

programme.title: Lockup: Louisville: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate's erratic behavior triggers the emergency response team and mental health staff; a murderer faces the death penalty while his girlfriend awaits trial in the women's wing of the same jail.

programme.title: Lockup: Louisville: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A repeat offender smuggles in contraband and an inmate becomes a marked man after murdering a Louisville rap star; a prescription pill epidemic takes its toll on the jail and drug use on the inside could keep another inmate from leaving.

programme.title: Lockup: Louisville: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A troubled young inmate, recently sentenced to prison, attempts to make a final impression on staff; a young woman who gave birth in the jail watches her baby grow up without her.

programme.title: Lockup: Louisville: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The jail responds with force after an officer is assaulted and inmates attempt escape; an 18-year old shoots her father to death then finds a surrogate mother on the inside.

programme.title: Lockup: Louisville: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One inmate's stress prompts an emergency response; a repeat offender is charged with beating her mother, and now must rely on her own daughter for support; an inmate known for his brawn decides to focus on his brain.

programme.title: Lockup: Louisville: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Police take a young man into custody following the murder of a 15-year-old boy in his Louisville, Ky., home; the jail finds itself with a multitude of related high-profile cases.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: In prison, as on the outside, a single decision can change a person's life forever; inmates make all kinds of fateful choices, but behind bars, there is no escaping the consequences of one's actions.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: In a life full of restrictions, we've seen inmates take control of whatever they can, despite the consequences; we've seen frustrated inmates reach their breaking point; in the battle of wills, some will take actions that can never be reversed.

programme.title: Lockup: Louisville: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The Louisville Metro Department of Corrections Jail has a daily population of about 2,000 men and women charged with anything from minor crimes to capitol murder; both buildings are overcrowded and their layouts are outdated.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A convicted sex offender becomes the victim of a brutal assault that leaves him unconscious and in the hospital; his assailants say the attack was warranted, but what they don't know might bring regret.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An infamous inmate is booked after a daring prison escape, but faces consequences that go well beyond what a judge could give him; Lockup tells the story of a criminal legend, his family and the devastating consequences of his decisions.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One inmate's troubled past leads to angry outbursts inside the jail, while another arrives after an alleged crime spree that sounds like it's right out of a movie; a young mother could go to prison if she's found guilty of robbery.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A pregnant woman faces the charge of killing her husband two months away from giving birth; her future lies in the hands of a judge; another inmate, also facing a murder charge, pays a price when he disobeys orders.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A murderous shooting spree erupts on a major religious holiday; a new inmate catches the jail staff's attention; a father of five receives haunting news from home.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The arrest of two brothers in the murders of four women.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Inmates who become disruptive at the Penitentiary of New Mexico are transferred to the lock-up units in level 5 or 6; the trouble is, their behavior doesn't always improve; this is a lesson rookie officer Amy lee is learning the hard way.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Prison officials initiate a shakedown after gang members in Level 6 overpower an officer in the recreation area, take her keys and stab a rival gang member; this type of incident simply adds to the tension already felt in the supermax facility.

programme.title: Lockup: New Mexico: Extended Stay
programme.desc: For some inmates, the only way out of prison is "paroling legit," or leaving in a body bag; others earn a lump sum of good time by completing programs or holding a prison job, while a few will take any chance to try to escape.

programme.title: Lockup: Tulsa: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A convicted sex offender becomes the victim of a brutal assault that leaves him unconscious and in the hospital; his assailants say the attack was warranted, but what they don't know might bring regret.
